page.title: 05Gnosall Middle School
page.content: Heron Brook Middle School Heron Brook has about 464 pupils and 24 teachers. The age range of our middle school is 9-13 years. Our school is situated in the large village of Gnosall about 11 kilometres west of the county town of Stafford. The school draws from a wide catchment area of nearly 100 square kilometres including the villages of Haughton, Woodseaves, Church Eaton and Bradley. Heron Brook provides a focal point for the local community in a rural area. Its facilities are used frequently by local organisations. In turn the local community provides considerable support for the school. Heron Brook school endeavours to meet the needs of its pupils by providing a very broad curriculum. The school tries to develop pupils' special talents and help them to overcome any difficulties.
